data.title: The Edward
description: This project is a single page web application for a small hospitality business located in Picton, ON.

They needed a simple site for customers to explore their various accommodations, view potential dates and proceed with bookings. The site is integrated with Lodgify.com's API's to fetch images, property details and availability.

data.title: Boardgame Marketplace
description: The aim of this site is to create an easy platform to trade games using an innovative matching system rather then the traditional posting marketplace system.

data.title: Madame Mimi's
description: Jamie's wife Mia (Mimi) has a dream of opening a cocktail bar called Madame Mimi's.
This is a self driven project as an exercise in React and an ode to that dream. A static web aplication utilizing cocktaildb.com's API.

data.title: Personal Portfolio
description: This personal portfolio website was an exercise to improve my knowledge of html, css and React.
The main focus during the building of the app was on responsive layouts, getting to better grips with flex and grid, and diving into transitions and animations.

data.title: Travel Planner
description: This was the final project for Udacity's front end web development certificate.
Main features are chaining together several API's in order to dynamically fetch data in the form of images and weather data, POST the data to the node/express serve and in turn update the UI.

data.title: SmallFoods
description: This project was set by an senior developer at a professional marketing company, Kula Partners, who very kindly offered to give feedback and suggestions in order for me to learn and improve.
